item.title: Fly Tipping andFlooding., 19th September
item.description:
Elmbridge Court ,A417 / A40 ,subways in poor state of repairs broken drain covers ,dirty walls ,graffiti over grown trees and weeds, and this is part of the Flagship Â£48 million cycle route between Gloucester and Cheltenham , over 50,0000 cyclists, pedestrians Mobility scooters users will travel these subways needs sorting ASAP ,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping and More, 19th September
item.description:
Elmbridge A417, A40 Golden Valley Underpass/Subways Defects & Flooding As part of the Flagship cycle spine of Â£48 million these underpasses are like walking & cycling through the bottom of a waste skip. On the 17/9/25 from 8am to 8.30am a count of 130 cyclists were using the cycle path to travel to Churchdown Schools and Thomas Richâs. My count of 130 cyclists in 30 mins x 2 = 260 a day thatâs 1300 week & 58,500 journeys per year. Would anyone want children to Navigate these overgrown & neglected areaâs. Also please think about Mobility scooters, Mothers with Prams and Pedestrians not included in this count.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
